quote: The open-source AI movement is unstoppable. Community innovation is outpacing corporate R&D.
author: adcock_brett

quote: Running AI locally means true ownership. Your data, your models, your rules.
author: elonmusk

quote: AGI will emerge from collaboration, not competition. Open source is the path forward.
author: ylecun

quote: The best AI tools are the ones that augment human creativity without replacing human agency.
author: sama

quote: Open-source AI democratizes access to cutting-edge technology. This is how we ensure AI benefits everyone.
author: goodfellow_ian

quote: Personal AI that respects privacy and runs on your own infrastructure - that's the future we should build.
author: random_walker

quote: The gap between research and production is shrinking thanks to open-source frameworks and tools.
author: hardmaru

quote: AI agents that can autonomously complete tasks are no longer science fiction. They're here, and they're open source.
author: DrJimFan

quote: The most transformative AI applications will come from individual developers building on open platforms.
author: jeremyphoward

quote: Open-source AI is not just about free software - it's about freedom, transparency, and community ownership.
author: jackclarkSF

quote: The future of work involves AI teammates, not AI replacements. Open source enables this collaborative vision.
author: emollick

quote: Self-hosted AI assistants are the antidote to surveillance capitalism. Take back control of your data.
author: mmasnick

quote: AGI development needs diverse perspectives. Open source ensures this technology isn't controlled by a handful of companies.
author: timnitGebru

quote: The most capable AI systems will be those that learn from you personally and adapt to your unique needs.
author: swyx

quote: Open-source AI frameworks are enabling innovations we couldn't have imagined just a few years ago.
author: weights_biases
